string-array.name: iodine_auth_error
string-array.item: Iodine error: An unidentified error has occurred.
Iodine error: Your login failed. Maybe your password is incorrect?
Iodine error: Your password and username were correct, but you don\'t appear to exist in the database. If this is a mistake, please contact the intranetmaster about it.
Iodine error: Your login failed. Maybe your username is incorrect?
Iodine error: Your TJ email address is not your username! Remove the @tjhsst.edu suffix.
Iodine error: Your account is not yet active for use on Intranet. Patience, young freshman.
